name: Prophet Kingdom
description:
The end of humanity has been prophesied. Numerous natural disasters have been predicted, but they can be delayed to give time for preparations. Use your prophetic knowledge to build the richest kingdom you can before its inevitable end.

Controls:

Click and drag to reorganize upcoming disasters
Click icons or press corresponding number key to select a building
Left-click to place building
Right-click to cancel building placement
WASD - move camera
QE - rotate camera
Scroll wheel - zoom camera in and out
R or middle mouse button - rotate building
ESC - exit game

Disasters:

Flood - expands outwards from water sources
Fire - spreads to nearby buildings
Quicksand - surrounds and destroys lone buildings

Made with Unity
Art created in Blender, MagicaVoxel, and Gimp
Music recorded in Studio One 5
